summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 13th Avennue South from Dawson Street to Snoqualmie Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues by constructing sewers together with necessary appurtenances; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8556 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
